definition: to meet by chance (usually with misfortune)/classifier for events: time, turn, incident

sentences.english: That way, they wouldn’t have to worry about encountering poachers and other dangerous humans.
sentences.chinese: 这样就不必担心他们遭遇偷猎者和其他危险分子了。

sentences.english: Mist nudged up against the windows and doors of the house.
sentences.chinese: 薄雾遭遇房屋的窗口和门而用肘轻推。

sentences.english: Against Milan it will be a direct encounter and even the match against Bate is important.
sentences.chinese: 对米兰将是一场遭遇战，对博里索夫的比赛也很关键。

sentences.english: Dirk Kuyt and David Ngog are battling calf and back injuries respectively.
sentences.chinese: 库伊特小腿有伤，恩格格则遭遇背部伤病。

sentences.english: So as I face tomorrow with its problems large and small.
sentences.chinese: 故我面临的遭遇，不论大小的难处。

sentences.english: I am certain, after 14 years of encounters with the Taliban, that they are not beyond redemption.
sentences.chinese: 遭遇塔利班14年，我知道他们并没有万劫不复。

sentences.english: But for the second day in a row, banking stocks in particular faced a rough ride.
sentences.chinese: 不过，在欧洲股市上，金融股连续第二天遭遇困境。

sentences.english: These people are not evidence about what might happen in the future -- they are real people suffering today.
sentences.chinese: 这些人的遭遇并不能代表未来将要发生的。

sentences.english: Zaphod: Hey. Sorry to hear about your planet. What was it called again?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，很抱歉听到你的星球的遭遇。它叫什么来着？

sentences.english: It is the first cold spring since 2000.
sentences.chinese: 2000年以来，杭州首次遭遇倒春寒。

sentences.english: At the beginning they met with much stupidity and apathy.
sentences.chinese: 开始的几次会议他们遭遇了很多麻木和冷漠。

sentences.english: The boys suffered loneliness, homesickness, "Pommy bashing" and culture shock.
sentences.chinese: 他们不能融入当地社会，还遭遇文化冲突。

sentences.english: Whether or not you're currently attached, you could be encountering some interesting romantic opportunities before the day is through.
sentences.chinese: 甭管你单身还是有了另一半，你今天还能遭遇桃花。

sentences.english: You constantly replay past confrontations, conversations and situations in your head.
sentences.chinese: 你会不断地在脑中重播过去的遭遇，对话和情境。

sentences.english: Kitano musashi narrates the sea, how to lose how encounter tikal emperor god crossbow.
sentences.chinese: 北野武藏叙说海上如何遭遇劲敌，如何失去天皇神弩。

sentences.english: When their future is confronted with love, which one is more important?
sentences.chinese: 当前程与爱情一同遭遇未来，该怎样弃取？

definition: to meet by chance (usually with misfortune)/classifier for events: time, turn, incident
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
to face sth/to be confronted with
to endure/to suffer/to be subjected to
to receive (praise, an education, punishment etc)/to be ...ed (praised, educated, punished etc)
